src:
Pretresljiva smrt italijanske 18-letnice: obvisela je z majico zataknjena na hišni ograji
04 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Spletno uredništvo

Italijanski mediji poročajo o pretresljivi smrti 18-letnega dekleta iz naselja Loranzé v bližini Torina. Ko se je vračala domov iz diskoteke, je želela preplezati dvoriščno ograjo, da ne bi zbudila domačih, kar se je nato izrodilo v nesmiselno tragedijo.



Fotografija je simbolična. Foto: Bumbaca

TORINO > Truplo dekleta, ki je obviselo z majico zataknjeno za ograjo, je včeraj zjutraj našla njena sestra. Kot poročajo italijanski mediji, se je dekle v noči na nedeljo vračalo iz diskoteke. Odločila se je, da bo preplezala kovinsko ograjo, ki obdaja hišo, po nekaterih poročanjih, da ne bi zbudila domačih, po drugih, ker naj bi bila brez ključev.
Njen nedolžen podvig se je žal končal tragično, saj se je z ovratnikom majice očitno zataknila za ograjo in zadušena obvisela na njej.
text:
The shocking death of an Italian 18-year-old: hanged with a T-shirt stuck on a house fence
04 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Web Editing

Italian media reports the shocking death of an 18-year-old girl from Loranzé near Turin. When she was returning home from the disco, she wanted to climb the backyard fence so as not to wake up the locals, which then turned into a senseless tragedy.



Photography is symbolic. Photo: Bumblebees

TORINO> The corpse of a girl hanging from a T-shirt stuck behind a fence was found by her sister yesterday morning. According to Italian media, the girl was returning from the disco on Sunday nights. She has decided to climb the metal fence surrounding the house, according to some reports, not to wake up the native ones, according to others, because she is supposed to be keyless.
Her innocent endeavor sadly ended tragically, as she apparently clung to the fence with her shirt collar and choked on it.
